attributes.review: I’m just thinking about all the toxic masculinity, sexist, racist, lies, and immature outbursts we had to go through over the years. Obviously this is vague af but it’s not hard to see that Trump doesn’t have the character or morality to be in office.
attributes.title: Horrible experience

attributes.review: this app literally made my phone smell weird. like how does an app make your phone smell weird i don’t know. and it made my mom disown me. i only downloaded it for 30 minutes and it actually ruined my life i think i might have to be not alive now.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE STINKY APP

attributes.review: A most disturbing experience indeed. It gave my phone many viruses (and then denied it) and tried to build a wall around itself to keep out “foreign threats to the American people. I mean really, HUUUGE threats”. It also tried to get rid of healthcare and lowered corporate taxes. No thanks. Always be true and VOTE BLUE!!!!

This app is by far the WORST app i’ve ever come across is it extremely laggy full of bugs and all in all have my
phone a virus i am very unhappy 1/10 would not recommend (also my friends mom downloaded it and now she’s dead)
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app was absolutely terrible!!! It take forever to get into the app it keeps on glitching me out, I hate this app so much, Trump 2020(but make it underground 💕) but this is one of the worst apps I ever had!! I do not recommend for people but I’m going to have to rate it a 1
attributes.title: 𝘒𝘺𝘭𝘢

attributes.review: I hate this app so much it has soo many complications and a lot of problems too many ads to many personal questions I just don’t like this app at all and I don’t think it should be on the App Store!!!
attributes.title: Disgusting horrible

attributes.review: the app made my phone glitch out to the point where i had to take it to the apple store and needed to get a new phone as well as the app leaked all my information including my banking info and my address do not download!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: It took about 4 hours to download. After that I opened it, and depressingly saw a Cheeto. What kind of app is this. I don’t want to see no orange puff on my screen. Definitely disappointed. Never expected to see a racist beach on my screen
attributes.title: Worst app in the world

attributes.review: This app took 2 hours to download when it had wifi. Wouldn’t stay open for more than 5 minutes before the app glitched and closed out. Just in all an awful working app😩😩😩
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: It said I had a virus and then I checked I did have a virus this app is one of the worst apps ever I can’t. I deleted it right after if you want my opinion DONT DOWNLOAD!! It’s a virus called Trump, it’s a horrible virus that will make your phone go all dumb like ur president. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!😤😤😤😤😤😤❌❌❌❌ 🤢🤢🤢🤢😭😭
